title: One Piece Episode #605 Anime Review
author: Fandom Post
description: A written review of Episode 605 highlighting the outburst that Tashigi brings into play and the kind of bond so many of the G-5 marines have with each other. Notes that Tashigi steals the show towards the end as some Navy men willingly sacrifice themselves.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for episode 605 events including the G-5 Marines' sacrifice
